frontend/src/data/indiaStates.ts: List of Indian states and union territories with stable IDs and display labels.

frontend/src/hooks/useModeration.ts: Stores muted/blocked users locally and filters messages based on moderation settings.

frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides a unified user profile hook that loads, creates, and updates either backend or anonymous profiles depending on authentication state.

frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.

frontend/src/pages/RoomsPage.tsx: Lists rooms by location, supports search and room creation, and handles auth and area-selection constraints.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Offers settings for location, profile, authentication, and admin access, including profile edits and area selection.

frontend/src/utils/auth/postLoginRedirec: Stores, retrieves, and clears post-login redirect paths using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/location/closestIndia: Computes the nearest Indian state to given coordinates using the Haversine formula and predefined centroids.
